Author: Brian M. Schilder

echoverse: echoverseTemplate

echoverse module: echoversePackageDescription.

If you use echoverseTemplate, please cite:

Brian M Schilder, Jack Humphrey, Towfique Raj, echolocatoR: an automated end-to-end statistical and functional genomic fine-mapping pipeline, Bioinformatics, 2021;, btab658, https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btab658

if(!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")

remotes::install_github("RajLabMSSM/echoverseTemplate")
library(echoverseTemplate)
